data.current_summary: Get aggregated invocations statistics for latest days
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve aggregated mock invocation statistics
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves aggregated invocation statistics for mock services across the latest days. Accepts a parameter to specify the number of days to include in the aggregation. Returns a collection of DailyInvocationStatistic objects containing invocation counts and metrics for each day. Useful for monitoring mock service usage patterns and performance trends.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve latest test execution results
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the latest test results from recent test runs executed by Microcks. Accepts a parameter to specify the number of recent results to return. Returns a collection of TestResult objects containing test execution details, including test cases, assertions, and pass/fail status for each service or API tested. Useful for monitoring test coverage and identifying failing tests.

data.summary_suggestion: Update metadata for a registered Service
data.description_suggestion: Updates the metadata for a registered Service or API in the Microcks repository. Metadata includes labels, annotations, and other organizational information. Requires authentication. Returns the updated Service object with modified metadata. This operation modifies the Service's metadata state and may affect service discovery and organization.

data.current_summary: Get the already used labels for Services

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all labels that have been applied to Services and APIs registered in the Microcks repository.
